name: Bunny time
description:
Its a cute game, but its ugly tough!!!

This game was made for the TriJam, first time doing a 3 hour jam, 

I was able to work with my kids, they made the level and helped pick out the Kenny art, for the three hours there a lot more i would have liked to have done, but this has shown me what I need to work on, and how much i have learned since I fist tried to make game. 

Arrow keys to move and the space for jumping, try to get all the gems as fast as your can.
